title: [Self-Directed] Elementary Reading/Writing and Autonomous Learning Competency Enhancement Program Using Design Thinking-Based NLP Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and mathematics subject knowledge
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, domain expertise: advanced, subject: mathematics, assessment method: formative assessment-centered, technology environment: BYOD.

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously construct mathematical problem-solving strategies by applying the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Learners can summarize and restructure written explanations of complex mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy using NLP-based language pattern analysis technology
Learners can build a personalized learning record system using digital tools (note apps, voice recording, etc.) and maintain self-directed learning habits for 12 weeks

resources: LMS Platform (Video Conferencing, Assignment Submission, Discussion Board Features)
NLP Text Analysis Tool (e.g., ChatGPT API)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
